summary_comment: The professor is widely regarded as a very good teacher who makes it easy for students to achieve high grades, particularly for boosting their GPA. However, students also note that the professor is extremely rude and impatient, often dismissing questions as coming from idiots.

Ratings.comment: This is an easy A class if you want to boost your GPA. However, Bing Mu is the rudest person I have ever met in this campus. Ask her a question and she will retreat you as an idiot. Rude, impatient.
